text: The RWE Tower in Essen is the highest building in the Ruhr area, and one of the highest buildings in Germany. It is used by RWE AG. As it shows the cultural and industrial change of the region, it is an important landmark in Essen. The skyscraper was designed by Ingenhoven Architects. == External links == Category:RWE Category:Office buildings completed in 1996 Category:Skyscrapers in Essen Category:Skyscraper office buildings in Germany
title: RWE Tower
